comments.body: it seems, in this function is a missing `title` by your documentation but then it is the same as https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/pull/51403/files#diff-91c4eda792aace8177f766a6c99725c79a920925a768795e12bd0f3bfdd80ca0R86 so I think that it is unnecessary
This function is overloaded with either `(status)` or `(title, status)` as documented inline here https://github.com/ivangreene/arena-js/blob/master/index.js#L103-L104
